channel.title: Services on Saba IT Solutions
channel.description: Recent content in Services on Saba IT Solutions

item.title: Maintenance & Support
item.description:
Are you on Saba and in need of top-tier computer maintenance and support? Look no further! With roots dating back to the early 1990s in the Netherlands, my expertise spans decades.

Today (January 2025), I’m proud to bring this wealth of experience to the beautiful island of Saba. Trust me to keep your systems running smoothly with the same dedication and quality service that has been my hallmark since day one. I can help you resolve networking and WiFi issues, install software, and re-install operating systems. Contact me for reliable computer maintenance and support.

item.title: Websites
item.description:
I have developed websites since the 1990s. My first application was an online shop for an organic farm, which was quite advanced for its time. Over the years, the digital landscape has evolved significantly, and so have my solutions.

Today, the possibilities for your online presence are virtually limitless. Whether you need a dynamic blog to share regular updates, an online shop to sell your products, or a custom-built website that showcases your brand, I can help you find or build the best solution. I am proficient in developing static websites using tools like Hugo, customizing WordPress websites, or building fully custom sites from the ground up using PHP or C#. Where applicable, open-source software such as Dolibarr (ERP) or Prestashop (webshop) can be used.

item.title: Hosting
item.description:
Choosing a hosting provider for your website or shared application can be overwhelming. With so many factors to consider, it’s not always easy to navigate. I can help you choose a solution tailored to your needs.

Shared Hosting

A shared hosting environment is ideal for websites with a moderate number of daily visitors. This solution is particularly suitable for small to medium-sized businesses, providing a cost-effective and reliable option.

Virtual Private Server (VPS)

A Virtual Private Server (VPS) may be an good choice when a bit more processing power is required. As the business expands and the number of visitors increases, a VPS can scale alongside, ensuring the web applications perform optimally.

item.title: Software Development
item.description:
Choose Saba IT Solutions for a seamless, collaborative, and result-driven software development experience. Letâ€™s take your business to new heights together!

Showcasing Our Expertise in Programming and Development

I take pride in diverse and robust programming skills. I have expertise in various programming languages and frameworks, including C#, .NET, ASP.NET, PHP, JavaScript, TypeScript, Angular, and NodeJS. Whether your project requires a straightforward static website built with tools like Hugo, or a fully customized website developed from the ground up using PHP or C#, I have the expertise to deliver top-notch solutions tailored to your needs.

item.title: Implementation services
item.description:
Effective software implementation is critical to achieving business success. Our “Implementation service” ensures that any software or software framework you need is installed and set up correctly from both a security and usability point of view.

Trust Saba IT Solutions to deliver implementation services that are efficient, effective, and tailored to your business. Let us handle the technical complexities while you focus on what you do best: growing your business.
